action.action-desc: Mr. Keating (for himself and Mr. Tierney) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to reauthorize and amend the Fishing Safety Training Grant Program and the Fishing Safety Research Grant Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fishing Safety Training and Research Act.

section.header: Reauthorization and amendment of Fishing Safety Training Grant Program and Fishing Safety Research Grant Program

subsection.text: Section 4502(i) of title 46, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting after paragraph (3) the following:

subparagraph.text: The Secretary shall establish a publicly accessible electronic database that lists the names of individuals who have participated in training sessions carried out with assistance under this subsection.
The Secretary shall require, as a condition of including the name of an individual in such database for any period longer than 18 months, that the individual complete retraining.

paragraph.text: The Secretary shall require that training carried out with a grant under this section shall be made available in languages other than English, as appropriate for the fishing port in which the training is offered.
in paragraph (6), as so redesignated, by striking 2010 through 2014 and inserting 2015 through 2025.

subsection.text: Section 4502(j)(4) of title 46, United States Code, is amended by striking 2010 through 2014 and inserting 2015 through 2025.
